main.name: Sri Harsha V A
main.bio: My name is Harsha. I am 20 and I'm a fullstack web developer.I love coding in Javascript, Typescript and Python, and have worked with frameworks like ReactJS, NextJS, Express, and NodeJs.I am a sophomore at VIT Chennai.I am a Core member in KLA(Kannada Literary Association) of VIT.  I am also the content writer and RnD member at the BIC(Business Innovation Community) club of VIT.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to know more about my work!

education.degree: Bachelor's Degree, Electronics and Computer Engineering

projects.title: Doodle your Day
projects.about: A digital journaling platform where users can capture daily moments, thoughts, and experiences. Features intuitive design and seamless note-taking capabilities.

projects.title: Sage
projects.about: An adaptive learning platform that personalizes educational content based on individual learning styles. Empowers users to master any subject through customized pathways.

projects.title: Akshaya
projects.about: A food waste reduction platform connecting surplus food from restaurants and events with those in need. Combats hunger while promoting sustainability.

projects.title: Arq-plus
projects.about: An augmented reality application that bridges digital and physical worlds. Provides immersive AR experiences with interactive 3D elements.

projects.title: Void Theme
projects.about: A minimalist VS Code theme featuring pure black background and carefully crafted syntax highlighting. Designed for developers who embrace darkness while coding.

projects.title: LeGit
projects.about: An intelligent VS Code extension that uses Google Gemini AI to generate meaningful Git commit messages. Streamlines development workflow with smart automation.

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
